Description.Text: Reikartz Kirovograd is a traditional 3-star superior hotel offering comfortable accommodation and high quality facilities close to the heart of Kirovograd. Highlights include a restaurant, gym and free Wi-Fi. Kirovograd is an elegant and culturally rich city, boasting history and modern attractions in equal measure. Situated close to the city centre, the hotel is well situated for guests to experience all Kirovograd has to offer. Nearby places of interest include The Fortress of St. Elizabeth, the Cathedral of the Transfiguration and the Arboretum, which boasts beautiful flowers in spring and summer, plus an amusement park and a handful of eateries. Kirovograd train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular destinations in north east Ukraine. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building with a tan coloured facade. Facilities include a small gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The restaurant offers Ukrainian and European dishes. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. A variety of hot and cold beverages can be enjoyed at the bar. Standard rooms are 21sqm and have a modern decor incorporating warm colours and light wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a mini-bar. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Free parking is possible onsite.
